snippet.title: Assassin's Creed Shadows: First Look Gameplay Trailer - Xbox Games Showcase 2024
snippet.description:
Tune in tomorrow for a 13 minutes gameplay walkthrough at Ubisoft Forward!

Watch the stream live starting June 10th, 9 am PT 

Assassin's Creed Shadows will be available November 15th, 2024

Learn more: https://www.xbox.com/games/assassins-creed-shadows 

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR 

FOLLOW XBOX
